targets.query: SELECT "duration" FROM "rpTalaiot"."build" WHERE (buildMachine = '$buildMachine') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "start" FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter  AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT username FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT gitBranch FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT cacheRatio FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT "duration" FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT gradleVersion FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT "success" FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT "rootProject" FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT "requestedTasks" FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT "scanLink" FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT osVersion FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter AND buildMachine != ''
SELECT buildMachine FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT count("value") FROM "$db"."$rp"."task" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT count("value") FROM "$db"."$rp"."task" WHERE $timeFilter AND "state"='FROM_CACHE'
SELECT count("value") FROM "$db"."$rp"."task" WHERE $timeFilter AND "state"='UP_TO_DATE'
SELECT count("value") FROM "$db"."$rp"."task" WHERE $timeFilter AND "state"='EXECUTED'
SELECT count("value") FROM "$db"."$rp"."task" WHERE $timeFilter AND "state"='NO_SOURCE'
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY requestedTasks, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("configuration") FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY requestedTasks, time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "$db"."$rp"."task" WHERE $timeFilter AND "rootNode" = 'false' GROUP BY state,time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("duration") FROM (SELECT "duration", buildMachine FROM "rpTalaiot"."build" WHERE (buildMachine != '') AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY buildMachine
SELECT mean(buildTime) FROM (SELECT "duration" AS buildTime, buildMachine FROM "rpTalaiot"."build" WHERE (buildMachine != '') GROUP BY buildMachine) WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "duration", buildMachine FROM "rpTalaiot"."build" WHERE (buildMachine != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY buildMachine
SELECT mean("duration") FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY buildMachine
SELECT percentile("duration", 90) FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE "requestedTasks"='$requestedTasks' AND $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("duration", 50) FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE "requestedTasks"='$requestedTasks' AND $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("maxWorkers", 90) FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE "requestedTasks"='$requestedTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("cacheRatio", 90) FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE "task"='$requestedTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("javaXmsBytes", 90) FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE "requestedTasks"='$requestedTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("javaXmxBytes", 90) FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE "requestedTasks"='$requestedTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("totalRamAvailableBytes", 90) FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE "requestedTasks"='$requestedTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("cpuCount", 90) FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE "requestedTasks"='$requestedTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("duration", 90) FROM "$db"."$rp"."build" WHERE "task"='$requestedTasks' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY $performance_slice, time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: show tag values on "$db" with key = "task"
list.name: requestedTasks
list.query: show tag values on "$db" with key = "task"
